document.discussion_title: Trump family unity aided by bulldozers, hard hats
document.topic_text: Trump family unity aided by bulldozers, hard hats Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 29 minutes ago ) WASHINGTON (AP) " There's something about bulldozers and hard hats that brings a family together.It worked for Donald Trump and his father. And it worked for Donald Trump and his children.Long before Donald Trump was a presidential... WASHINGTON (AP) — There’s something about bulldozers and hard hats that brings a family together.
